meanings.definition: A container used for brewing and serving coffee.
meanings.sent1: My mom poured coffee from the coffeepot into my favorite mug.
meanings.sent2: The coffeepot on the kitchen counter was always full in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The coffeepot seemed to smile as it dispensed its warm, comforting brew.
meanings.sent4: The coffeepot hummed happily as it worked its magic.
meanings.sent5: The shiny coffeepot gleamed in the morning sunlight, promising a fresh start to the day.

meanings.definition: A device for making coffee by percolation or filtration.
meanings.sent1: The coffeepot gurgled as it brewed a fresh pot of coffee.
meanings.sent2: She carefully cleaned the coffeepot after each use to keep it in good condition.
meanings.sent3: The coffeepot decided to take a day off and refused to brew any coffee.
meanings.sent4: The coffeepot worked tirelessly, filtering out the best coffee every time.
meanings.sent5: The aroma from the coffeepot filled the room, enticing everyone with its rich scent.

meanings.definition: A pot with a spout, handle, and lid used for brewing coffee.
meanings.sent1: The coffeepot's handle was always warm from the freshly brewed coffee.
meanings.sent2: He lifted the lid of the coffeepot to check if there was any coffee left.
meanings.sent3: The coffeepot felt proud of its elegant spout, perfect for pouring coffee.
meanings.sent4: The coffeepot's lid acted as a guardian, protecting the precious coffee inside.
meanings.sent5: The steam rising from the coffeepot created a dreamy atmosphere in the kitchen.
